item.title: Restarter, no downloading or editing batch files!
item.dc:creator: @trevor268 trevor268
item.description:
@trevor268 wrote:

ALL CREDITS TO callmejjp, NONE TO ME I DID NOT DO THIS I SAW IN TUTS AND THOUGHT ITDE BE USEFULL

open antilag.java, youll see this at beggining NOTE:this is czar based dunno what servers have

[code]public class antilag {

public int ResetTimer = 0;

public void resetserver() {
    misc.println("RESETING SERVER!!!");
    misc.println("Saving all games...");
    PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
    misc.println("GAME SUCCESSFULLY SAVED FOR ALL PLAYERS");
    ResetTimer = 0;
    closeListener();
    runserver();
}

public void process() {
    ResetTimer += 1;
    if (ResetTimer >= 99999) {
        resetserver();

[/code]

or close to that. Where it says: If reset item >= 99999 change to 3000 and now you have a working restarter

Read full topic
